plot: In 1983, Maurice Bishop and a number of his colleagues were machine-gunned to death. Their bodies were never found.
title: Forward Ever: The Killing of a Revolution
plot_es: In 1983, Maurice Bishop and a number of his colleagues were machine-gunned to death. Their bodies were never found.
